text: If anything can go wrong, it will.
name: Murphy’s Law

text: If anything can’t go wrong, it still will.
name: Murphy’s Law (amended)

text: If one thing goes wrong, everything else will, and at the same time.
name: Drucker’s Law

text: Anything that can go wrong will go wrong while Murphy is out of town.
name: Mrs. Murphy’s Law

text: Anything that can go wrong, will—at the worst possible moment.
name: Finagle’s law

text: It always takes longer than you expect, even when you take into account Hofstadter’s Law.
name: Hofstadter’s Law

text: Work expands to fill the time available for its completion.
name: Parkinson’s law

text: The time spent on any agenda item will be in inverse proportion to the sum of money involved.
name: Parkinson’s law of triviality

text: In a hierarchy, every employee tends to rise to his level of incompetence.
name: Peter Principle

text: Technology is dominated by two types of people: those who understand what they do not manage and those who manage what they do not understand.
name: Putt’s Law

text: Nothing is ever as simple as it seems.
name: Common Law

text: Whatever you set out to do, something else must be done first.
name: Common Law

text: Your code either dies a prototype or it becomes legacy.
name: Swizec’s Law
